name: Email OTP Authenticator
author: Chandan Shrivastava

sections.description:
Send OTP through email to Login/Verify the users without any password. This is very fast, user friendly and more secure technique. Optimize your WordPress website with this new flavor.

This plugin provides the FACILITIES as Register, Login, Verify, Authenticate users without any PASSWORD. The PROCESS is very Fast, Direct, User Friendly and More Secure. The INTEGRATION of this plugin is very Easy, Simple and Without Coding. Email OTP Authenticator is a simple plugin that make your complete website user friendly, secure and more reliable only with email authentication and without any password.

A simple plugin that allow you to Secure login/verify with One Time Password(OTP) into WordPress site through email. Allow WooCommerce customers to login/verify on your website by OTP. An OTP login/verification is more secure than a static password, especially a user-created password.

An OTP is more secure than a static password, especially a user-created password, which can be weak and/or reused across multiple accounts. OTPs may replace authentication, login information or may be used in addition to it in order to add another layer of security.

Pirated, Nulled, Cracked, Hacked or Shared copy of this plugin, Leads to easy unauthorized access to your sensitive website data.

See the plugin intro video

Features

  • Allow user to login/verify with email OTP (One Time Password)
  • Allow WooCommerce customers login/Authenticate to verify with email OTP (One Time Password)
  • Allow Login with OTP for any plugins
  • Lightbox login/verification popup
  • Define Redirect url
  • Add login/verification popup anywhere on the website.

OTP Pop-up Class Name

  • emailotpauthn-popup

Shortcode

  • [email_otp_authn title=”Authenticate with OTP”]

Please don’t forget to leave your valuable feedback and suggestions to make our plugin much better compare to other plugin. Share your feedback to plugin author
sections.installation:
Installing the plugin:

  1. Unzip the plugin’s directory into wp-content/plugins.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. The settings page will be available under settings menu (Settings >> Email OTP Authn)
sections.faq:
Can I login into WordPress admin using OTP?

  • Yes, you can login into WordPress admin by OTP(One Time Password).

Can I add login popup window on my website menu?

  • Yes, you can add login popup into your website menu by add a class name i.e emailotpauthn-popup in parent of login link.

Can I add verification popup window on my website menu or anywhere?

  • Yes, you can add login/verification popup into your website menu by add a class name i.e emailotpauthn-popup in parent of login/verification link.

Can I process the authenticator response after failed/success verification?

  • Yes, you can process login/verification popup response through jquery/javascript/php code at any where in your website.

Can A guest user verify or authenticate his email?

  • No, this facility will be provided in the next version of this plugin.
